review: I mean, it definitely helps with the infection, but holy moly do I feel worse while taking it! I feel sick... It's a great drug, just... Don't take it if you don't wanna feel sick for a week

Found out I had Gonorrhea, was afraid of the nausea from Azithromycin, so I took 7 days of twice a day doxycycline, worked like a charm.  I never got bloated or nausea or diarrhea, BUT I took lots of supplementary probiotics and I limited dairy and caffeine, a lot.    Symptoms were gone by day 2, but that was because of the Rocephin Shot.  Enjoy!
